title: 8 Blockchain Giants Log $3.77 Billion in NFT Sales in Q1 2024
description: Despite experiencing a downturn for four straight weeks, eight blockchain networks logged $3.77 billion in non-fungible token (NFT) sales in the first quarter of 2024. Leading the charge, Ethereum-centric NFTs accounted for $1.4 billion or 37% of the NFT sales during Q1 2024. The Dual Forces of Organic NFT Sales and Wash Volume Across Several […]

title: U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau comes for crypto
description: The United States Consumer Financial Protection Bureau (CFPB) has put the spotlight on crypto gaming, issuing a stark warning about potential scams and a general lack of safeguards for gamers. The focus is on bridging virtual items with real-world value, according to their latest report, “Banking in video games and virtual worlds.” As gaming becomes […]

title: The Role of the AI2 Institute in Developing AI Expertise
description: AI2, based in France, is introducing new ways and subjects to cater to the growing needs of artificial intelligence professionals in various sectors. As artificial intelligence is playing its role in every industry, from tech-based businesses to pharmaceuticals, and from poverty reduction to conservation efforts, artificial intelligence covers a broad spectrum of today’s life, and […]

title: Ethena’s USDe Now Real Threat To Maker’s DAI: Coinbase Analyst
description:
David Han, a research analyst at Coinbase, has highlighted Ethena’s newly launched USDe stablecoin as a formidable rival to MakerDAO’s DAI stablecoin. In Coinbase’s latest market trends report, research analyst David Han emphasized that USDe’s growth has significantly outpaced MakerDAO’s DAI in 2024 thus far. According to the researcher, USDe has gained market share relative […]

The post Ethena’s USDe Now Real Threat To Maker’s DAI: Coinbase Analyst appeared first on Coin Edition.
